message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today.  I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $20,000 for it.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $12,000 for it. Could we possibly meet in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $12,000 is too low for me. Could you meet me at $17,000?
Thank you for your response, Alice. I appreciate your offer, but I am still unable to meet you at $17,000. I am willing to pay up to $14,000 for the product. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
